policies.inbound:
<set-variable name="PriBackendIndxs" value="@{
            JArray list =  new JArray();
            JArray backends = (JArray)context.Variables["listBackends"];
            int requestPriority = (int)context.Variables["RequestPriority"];
            for (int i = 0; i < backends.Count; i++) {
                JObject backend = (JObject)backends[i];
                if (backend["acceptablePriorities"]?.Values().Contains(requestPriority) == true) {
                    list.Add(i);
                }
            }
            return list;
        }" />
		<set-variable name="RetryCount" value="@{
            return ((JObject)context.Variables["priorityCfg"])
                .GetValue(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("RequestPriority", 3).ToString())?
                .Value("retryCount") ?? 1;
        }" />
		<set-variable name="ShouldRequeue" value="@{
            return ((JObject)context.Variables["priorityCfg"])
                .GetValue(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("RequestPriority", 3).ToString())?
                .Value("requeue") ?? true;
        }" />
		<set-variable name="backendLog" value="@{
            int requestPriority = (int)context.Variables["RequestPriority"];
            JArray priorityBackendIndxs = (JArray)context.Variables["PriBackendIndxs"];
            JArray backends = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("listBackends", new JArray());
            string backendLog = "BACKENDS: ";

            foreach (int i in priorityBackendIndxs) {
                JObject backend = (JObject)backends[i];
                backendLog += "  index=" + i + "  isThrottling=" + backend.Value("isThrottling") +
                   " retryAfter=" + backend.Value("retryAfter").ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ");
            }

            backendLog += " REQUEST PRIORITY: " + requestPriority +
                "  REQUEST-HEADERS: " +
                string.Join(", ",
                    context.Request.Headers
                        .Where(h => !string.Equals(h.Key, "api-key", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase) &&
                                    !string.Equals(h.Key, "Authorization", StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))
                        .Select(h => $"{h.Key}: {string.Join(", ", h.Value)}")
                );
            return backendLog;

        }" />
policies.backend:
<retry condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("ShouldRetry", true))" count="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("RetryCount", 50))" interval="1" delta="1">
			
			<set-variable name="listBackends" value="@{
                JArray backends = (JArray)context.Variables["listBackends"];

                backends.OfType()
                    .Where(backend => backend.Value("isThrottling") && DateTime.UtcNow >= backend.Value("retryAfter"))
                    .ToList()
                    .ForEach(backend => {
                        backend["isThrottling"] = false;
                        backend["retryAfter"] = DateTime.MinValue;
                    });


                // check if the previous run was limited or timed out.  Mark backend for throttling if so.
                var callCompleted = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("callCompleted", true);
                var lastStatusCode = context.Response?.StatusCode ?? 0;
                var shouldLimit = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("shouldLimit", "off");
                var wasLimited = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("wasLimited", false);
                var backendIndex = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendIndex", -1);

                // There was either a timeout  or a limitConcurrency that was hit
                if ( (!callCompleted && lastStatusCode!=200) || (shouldLimit!="off" && wasLimited && backendIndex >= 0 && backendIndex < backends.Count) ) {
                    JObject backend = (JObject)backends[backendIndex];
                    backend["isThrottling"] = true;
                    backend["retryAfter"] = DateTime.UtcNow.AddSeconds(4);
                }

                return backends;
            }" />

			
			
			<set-variable name="backendIndex" value="@{
                // Retrieve the list of backends
                JArray backends = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("listBackends", new JArray());
                if (!backends.Any()) {return -1;}

                JArray priorityBackendIndxs = (JArray)context.Variables["PriBackendIndxs"];

                // Find all non-throttling backends that support the request priority
                var availableBackends = new List();
                int lowestPriority = int.MaxValue;
                
                // Find the lowest priority available backends
                foreach (int i in priorityBackendIndxs) {
                    JObject backend = (JObject)backends[i];
                    if (!backend.Value("isThrottling")) {
                        int priority = backend.Value("priority");
                        if (priority < lowestPriority) {
                            lowestPriority = priority;
                            availableBackends.Clear();
                            availableBackends.Add(i);  // Store the index instead of the backend object
                        } else if (priority == lowestPriority) {
                            availableBackends.Add(i);  // Store the index instead of the backend object
                        }
                    }
                }

                if (!availableBackends.Any())  { return -1; }

                // pick a random backend from the available ones
                return availableBackends[ new Random(context.RequestId.GetHashCode()).Next(availableBackends.Count) ];

            }" />
            <set-variable name="shouldLimit" value="@{
                // Check if the backend should limit concurrency
                JArray backends = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("listBackends", new JArray());
                int backendIndex = (int)context.Variables["backendIndex"];
                if (backendIndex < 0 || backendIndex >= backends.Count) { return false; }
                JObject backend = (JObject)backends[backendIndex];
                return backend.Value("LimitConcurrency");
            }" />
			<set-variable name="backendLog" value="@{
                int backendIndex = (int)context.Variables["backendIndex"];
                var shouldLimit = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("shouldLimit", "off");

                string backendLog = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendLog", "");
                backendLog += "  NEXT INDEX TO TRY: " + backendIndex + " SHOULD LIMIT: " + shouldLimit + 
                              "  NOW=" + DateTime.UtcNow.ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ");
                return backendLog;
            }" />
			
			<set-variable name="RetryCount" value="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("RetryCount") - 1)" />
			
				<when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendIndex", 0) > -1 && context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("RetryCount") > 0)">
					
					
					<set-variable name="backendUrl" value="@(((JObject)context.Variables["selectedBackend"]).Value("url") + "/openai")" />
					<set-variable name="ModelType" value="@(((JObject)context.Variables["selectedBackend"]).Value("ModelType"))" />
					<set-variable name="api-key" value="@(((JObject)context.Variables["selectedBackend"]).Value("api-key"))" />
					<set-variable name="backendCallCounter" value="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendCallCounter") + 1)" />
					
					
					
					
						<when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("api-key", "") != "")">
							
								@((string)context.Variables["api-key"])
							
						
						
							
								@("Bearer " + (string)context.Variables["managed-id-access-token"])
							
						
					
					<set-variable name="backendLog" value="@{
                        string backendLog = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendLog", "");
                        int index         = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendIndex", 0);

                        backendLog += "  Using " + ((JObject)((JArray)context.Variables["listBackends"])[index]).Value("ModelType") + " backend: Now=";
                        backendLog += DateTime.UtcNow.ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ") + " - " + ((JObject)((JArray)context.Variables["listBackends"])[index]).Value("url"); 

                        return backendLog;
                    }" />
                    

                    
                    
                    
                        <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("shouldLimit", "off") == "low")">
                            
                                
                            
                        
                        <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("shouldLimit", "off") == "medium")">
                            
                                
                            
                        
                        <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("shouldLimit", "off") == "high")">
                            
                                
                            
                        
                        
                            
        					
                        
                    
                    
                    

					<set-variable name="backendLog" value="@{
                        string backendLog = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendLog", "");
                        backendLog += "  HEADERS: Now=" + DateTime.UtcNow.ToString("yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ") +
                            " - " + string.Join(", ", context.Response.Headers.Select(h => $"{h.Key}: {string.Join(", ", h.Value)}"));
                        return backendLog;
                    }" />
				
			

			
            <set-variable name="hasFailed" value="@{
                // A timeout causes context.Response to be null
                bool isTimeout = context.Response == null;
                
                // For other errors, check status codes
                bool isErrorStatus = context.Response != null && 
                    (context.Response.StatusCode == 429 || 
                    context.Response.StatusCode == 408 || 
                    context.Response.StatusCode >= 500);
                
                // If we have a timeout, also log it
                if (isTimeout) {
                    var startTime = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("requestStartTime", DateTime.MinValue);
                    var duration = DateTime.UtcNow - startTime;
                }
                
                return isTimeout || isErrorStatus;
            }" />
			
			
				<when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("hasFailed", true) )">
					
					<set-variable name="listBackends" value="@{
                        JArray backends = (JArray)context.Variables["listBackends"];
                        int currentBackendIndex = (int)context.Variables["backendIndex"];

                        // Validate backend index
                        if (currentBackendIndex < 0 || currentBackendIndex >= backends.Count) {
                            return backends; // Return unchanged if index is invalid
                        }

                        JObject backend = (JObject)backends[currentBackendIndex];

                        // Attempt to retrieve retry-after duration from headers
                        string[] retryHeaders = new[] { "retry-after" };
                        int retryAfterSeconds = backend["defaultRetryAfter"].Value(); 

                        foreach (string headerName in retryHeaders) {

                            if (context.Response.Headers.Keys.Any(k => string.Equals(k, headerName, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))){
                                string headerValue = context.Response.Headers[headerName].FirstOrDefault();

                                if (int.TryParse(headerValue, out int parsedValue) && parsedValue > 0)
                                {
                                    retryAfterSeconds = parsedValue;
                                    break;
                                }
                            }
                        }

                        // Update backend status
                        backend["isThrottling"] = true;

                        // we're multi-processing, so we need to set the retryAfter to the max of the current and the new one
                        var newRetryAfter = DateTime.UtcNow.AddSeconds(retryAfterSeconds);
                        if (newRetryAfter > backend["retryAfter"].Value()) {
                            backend["oldTime"] = DateTime.UtcNow;
                            backend["oldRetryAfter"] = retryAfterSeconds;
                            backend["retryAfter"] = newRetryAfter;
                        }

                        return backends;     
                    }" />
					
				
			
			<set-variable name="unThrottledBackends" value="@{
                var backends = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("listBackends", new JArray());
                var priorityBackendIndxs = (JArray)context.Variables["PriBackendIndxs"];
                int count=0;
                foreach (int i in priorityBackendIndxs) {
                    JObject backend = (JObject)backends[i];
                    if (!backend.Value("isThrottling")) {
                        count++;
                    }
                }
                return count;
            }" />
			<set-variable name="ShouldRetry" value="@{
                var hasFailed = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("hasFailed", true);
                var retryCount = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("RetryCount", 0);
                var count = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("unThrottledBackends", 0);

                return hasFailed && count > 0 && retryCount > 0;
            }" />
			<set-variable name="ShouldRequeueNow" value="@{
                var ShouldRequeue = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("ShouldRequeue", true);
                var hasFailed     = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("hasFailed", true);
                var backendIndex  = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendIndex", 0);
                var count = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("unThrottledBackends", 0);

                return ShouldRequeue && (backendIndex == -1 || (hasFailed && count == 0));
            }" />
			
				<when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("ShouldRequeueNow", true))">
					
					<set-variable name="sleepDuration" value="@{
                        // This gets triggered when all backends are throttling, let's sleep for the minimum retry time and then retry

                        JArray backends = context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("listBackends", new JArray());
                        JArray priorityBackendIndxs = (JArray)context.Variables["PriBackendIndxs"];
                        DateTime minRetryTime  = DateTime.MaxValue;

                        foreach (int i in priorityBackendIndxs) {
                            if (backends[i].Value("isThrottling") && backends[i].Value("retryAfter") < minRetryTime) {
                                minRetryTime = backends[i].Value("retryAfter");
                            }
                        }

                        if (minRetryTime > DateTime.UtcNow)  {
                            return (int)Math.Min(120000,  (minRetryTime - DateTime.UtcNow).TotalMilliseconds);
                        }

                        return 1000;
                    }" />
					
					
						
						
							true
						
						
							@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("sleepDuration",10000).ToString())
						
                        
                            @(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendCallCounter", 0).ToString())
                        
                        
					
				
                <when condition="@(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("RetryCount") == 0)">
                    
                        
                        
                            @(context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendCallCounter", 0).ToString())
                        
                        
                            @((string)context.Variables.GetValueOrDefault("backendLog", ""))
